content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Editing reverse DNS validation settings Procedure Go to Inbound Protection → Connection Filtering → Reverse DNS Validation. Click the Settings tab. From the list of reverse DNS validation domains, click a sender domain that you want to edit. Modify the reverse DNS validation settings as required. Note For details about the settings, see Adding reverse DNS validation settings. Click Save. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
